name: Legolas

features_and_traits.name: Favored Enemy: Undead
features_and_traits.description: Advantage on Survival checks to track undead and on Intelligence checks to recall information about them.

features_and_traits.name: Natural Explorer: Forest
features_and_traits.description: Difficult terrain doesn't slow your group's travel in forests. Your group can't become lost except by magical means.

features_and_traits.name: Fighting Style: Archery
features_and_traits.description: +2 bonus to attack rolls with ranged weapons (already included)

features_and_traits.name: Darkvision
features_and_traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

features_and_traits.name: Fey Ancestry
features_and_traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

personality_traits: Keen eyes, rarely speaks unless necessary
ideals: Freedom - Live free in the wilds
bonds: My clan and the forest are my life
